item.title: Microsoft Oulook Email Folder
item.description: Open .pst file Tool sudo apt install readpst Basic # Convert to mbox format readpst emails.pst # Open .mbox (plaintext) cat emails.mbox Read many emails # Use mutt mutt -Rf emails.mbox +--------------------------------------+ | Note: Answer No to create /root/Mail | | | | Arrow : Move to the email | | Enter : View email | | q : back | | q again : quit | +--------------------------------------+ Open .
